title: Reza presents at AAPM annual meeting
text: Reza Reiazi presents his poster entitled, "Prediction of HPV Status in the Head and Neck Cancer Patient Using CT Derived Radiomic Features: The Impact of CT Scanner" at the AAPM annual meeting

title: Reza presents at Imaging Network Ontario
text: Reza Reiazi delivers a presentation entitled "The Impact of the Variation of CT Scanner on the Prediction of Human papillomavirus (HPV) Association of Oropharyngeal Cancer (OPC) using Radiomic Models" at St. Francis Xavier University

title: Dr. Mattea Welch presents at OICR radiomics and imaging forum
text: Dr. Mattea Welch presents her findings on Exploring Automation and Radiomics in Head and Neck Imaging Studies at OICR radiomics and imaging forum

title: Michal Kazmierski presents his poster at ASCO 2020 in Chicago
text: Michal Kazmierski presents his poster on Radiomic response evaluation of recurrent or metastatic squamous cell cancer patients receiving Pembrolizumab on KEYNOTE-012 study at ASCO 2020 in Chicago

title: Dr. Benjamin Haibe-Kains presents at theComputational Medicine Seminar Series, Wharton/Elia Day 2019, University Health Network
text: Dr. Benjamin Haibe-Kains presents "Radiomics in the Era of Data Science: An RMP Collaborative Effort" at the Computational Medicine Seminar Series, Wharton/Elia Day 2019, University Health Network.
